name: create-list-items
statements:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS list_items (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  category TEXT,
  sorting INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  created_at INTEGER
)
UPDATE list_items SET created_at = strftime('%s','now') WHERE created_at IS NULL
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_list_items_category_sort ON list_items(category, sorting, id)
